1.6.5.message: change package name from nd-config to @nd/config

1.6.4.message: improve validation on string and number

1.6.3.message: change datatype of output.level to be number instead

1.6.2.message: on-the-fly override default output.level to 1 when first save

1.6.1.message: output.level will go high and higher

1.6.0.message: add configuration validation on set method

1.5.1.message: refactor code for support individual key value

1.5.0.message: change behavior of event in config; will notify everytime without filter

changelog.1.4.2: fix config error when start on new computer
changelog.1.4.1: add support multiple config in oneline
changelog.1.4.0: config can be restore to default and initial with user prompt
changelog.1.3.0: not only load config; but also save back to file
changelog.1.1.0: fix and improve workflow when config not found
